short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store and Retrieve Texts with Ease! Save and access addresses, bank account numbers, IDs, and more effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Save and Retrieve Frequently Used Texts! Store essential information such as addresses, bank account numbers, ID numbers, and more with ease. Access them instantly whenever you need them. and retrieve it whenever required.

Securely Store Data Locally, Right in Your Browser! Your valuable information remains safely stored on your own device, never leaving the confines of your machine.
